mapper.select: select member_id as memberId, member_pw as memberPw, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_name as memberName, age, gender, phone, email, member_level as memberLevel from member

select member_id as memberId , member_pw as member_pw, member_nickname as memberNickname, member_name as memberName, age, gender as gender, phone, email, member_level as memberLevel from ( select member_id , member_pw , member_nickname , member_name , age, gender, phone, email, member_level , row_number() over (order by member_level desc) as rnum from member where 1=1
)member where rnum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} order by member_level desc
select company_id as companyId, license, company_url as companyUrl, join_confirm as joinConfirm from company
mapper.update: update company set join_confirm =1 where company_id=#{companyId}
mapper.select: select REGION_COUNTRY as regionCountry from region group by region_country
select region_no as regionNo, region_country as regionCountry, region_city as regionCity, filename from region where region_country=#{regionCountry}

select rg.REGION_NO as regionNo, rg.REGION_COUNTRY as regionCountry, rg.REGION_CITY as regionCity, ph.FILEPATH as filepath, rg.FILENAME from REGION rg, photo ph where REGION_COUNTRY =#{regionCountry} and ph.FILENAME = rg.FILENAME

select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_writer as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, ask_date as askDate, qna_answer as qnaAnswer, answer_date as answerDate from qna join member on member_id=qna_writer

select qna_no as qnaNo, qna_writer as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, ask_date as askDate , qna_answer as qnaAnswer, answer_date as answerDate from qna where qna_no = #{qnaNo}
mapper.update: update qna set qna_answer=#{qnaAnswer}, answer_date=sysdate where qna_No=#{qnaNo}
mapper.select: select report_no as reportNo, report_category as reportCategory, report_content as reportContent, report_date as reportDate, board_class as boardClass, board_no as boardNo, reported_member as reportedMember, report_writer as reportWriter from report
mapper.update: update qna set qna_answer=#{qnaAnswer} where qna_no=#{qnaNo}
